header.name: Piotr Falkowski
header.title: Senior Backend Software Developer with over 10 years of experience.

about.firstParagraph: Driven, passionate, problem solver. I taught myself C++ to analyze financial time series using ML. Then it snowballed into .NET and countless other technologies. I’ve seen a lot, maybe even too much sometimes. I drew conclusions and now I focus on radical simplicity to ensure quality and maintainability.
about.secondParagraph: Beyond my full-time work, I actively develop the ML stock market prediction app. I'm also involved in the development and shape of Squizzu.com, an AI driven tech quiz platform.

consent: I hereby agree for processing the following personal information for the purposes of recruitment processes only.

igexao.title: IGE+XAO - Intern
igexao.description: Implemented database wide undo T-SQL procedure ahead of schedule using c# code generator based on table schema. Maintained C++ CAD desktop app.

transactor.title: Transactor Poland - Junior Software Developer
transactor.description: Started as a Junior Software Developer and was promoted to Regular after successfully delivering the first project — a WPF business intelligence application that aggregated data from multiple APIs, providing significant value to the customer at a low cost. C#, WPF, XSLT, XSD, SQLite, Ms SQL. Developed, refactored, bug fixed, and unit tested an end-to-end insurance lifetime management system. Participated in multiple third-party integrations, including payment providers and data enrichment services, ensuring interoperability between systems. T-SQL, WCF, ASP.NET API, WPF, Windows Forms, VB.NET, MS SQL, WWF, SignalR, SOAP, AzureDevops (VSTS at the time), Trello, Jira and Zendesk.

opengi.title: Open GI - Software Developer
opengi.description: Took part in modernizing legacy desktop monolith by splitting and migrating logic into microservices while heavily unit-testing existing functionality and moving slowly by first hosting the old Windows Application over Azure Virtual Desktop. Used ASP.NET Core, WCF, RabbitMQ, WWF, Azure IaaS, MongoDB, MS SQL, SonarQube, Docker.

ju.title: Jagiellonian University - Researcher
ju.description: I developed electroencephalogram (EEG) monkey brain activity classifier and an Arduino-based tactile stimulator. The stimulator features 2 gloves with 5 efectors, each controllable separately via COM and  [source](https://github.com/PFalkowski/HapticStimulatorPCA9685). For classification I used Python's Keras achieving accuracy above 0.8 after applying FFT and other transformations to raw EEG time series [source](https://github.com/PFalkowski/KerasClassifierEeg).

smh.title: Seville More Helory Polska - Senior Software Developer
smh.description: Implemented, documented and unit tested GIT inspired document version control in C# ASP.NET / CosmosDb / Azure AI (Cognitive) Search + Azure Service Bus + Redis + SignalR + SonarCloud. /n Cut Azure Redis Cache costs by implementing an intermediate cache layer based on CosmosDb./nDesigned and implemented the backend for a bespoke process that secured a key client, increasing company revenue by over 10%. C# Web.API + CosmosDb + React.

list: 2025 - Niebezpiecznik - Attacking and Securing Web Apps

additionalInfo.hobbies: Hobbies: economics (personal finance and quantitative analysis), board games, running, bodybuilding.

otherProjects.stockinsight: Stock market analysis tool [Stockinsight](https://stockinsight.pl). Hosting: Azure, BE: C# MsSQL ML.NET, FE: pure HTML + CSS + JS.
otherProjects.squizzu: I am CTO of [Squizzu](https://squizzu.com), a tech quiz platform being built in React and C#.
otherProjects.otherVentures: Throughout my journey, I have also explored other startup ventures like an online course platform, and a calendar tool built with PowerApps. While these projects didn't achieve long-term success, they provided valuable lessons and skills like proficiency in PowerPlatform.

nugetPackages.loggerLite: A lightweight logging framework supporting JSON, XML, YAML, and console output, with built-in debouncing.
nugetPackages.onTheFlyStats: Allows on-the-fly computation of statistics such as means and variance allowing O(1) access.
nugetPackages.extensionsStandard: A collection of extension methods for common programming tasks such as interpolation and partitioning.
nugetPackages.progressReporting: A library for estimating completion time and reporting progress in iterative operations and data transfers.

otherProjects.nugetFooter: These and other packages are available on [NuGet.org](https://www.nuget.org/profiles/PFalkowski).
